'''Appraiser's Treasure''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Appraiser's Treasure is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.
